title: Getty Images circulation
research_question: By which web pages are the most significant stock photos used?
description: When stock images travel online, their meaning shifts. This page showcases the contextual usage of some of the most frequently encountered visual stereotypes sourced from Getty Images for each query. By selecting an image, users can explore a list of websites where the image is hosted.
protocol: For each stereotype, collect the 3 highest ranked images
Reverse search images on Google Image Search
Collect top 20 web pages hosting the images
Collect URL and Title for each web page
